title: Multiplayer Sleeping
description: Uh, no, no, no, no. What are you looking at, butt-head? Hey Marty, I'm not your answering service, but you're outside pouting about the car, Jennifer Parker called you twice. Something that really cooks. Alright, alright this is an oldie, but uh, it's an oldie where I come from. Alright guys, let's do some blues riff in b, watch me for the changes, and uh, try and keep up, okay. Your, your right. Now, Biff, um, can I assume that your insurance is gonna pay for the damage?

features.label: Allows players to sleep through the night when 25% of online players (In the overworld) are sleeping
Utilises AFK Detector to ignore players who are online but not active
Chat message announces require player count to pass night as well as cancel button to kick sleeping players if night is required
